movies.title: Die Fighting
movies.plot: When a team of Shaolin-trained kung fu actors is about to get their break in Hollywood, a mysterious and sadistic Director forces them to run a gauntlet through Los Angeles. The Director films their every move as they prove their prowess by provoking a rogues' gallery of underworld thugs and martial artists.

biography.bio: Fabien Garcia is known for his work on Die Fighting (2014), Fantasy Story (2007) and Drained World (2015).
biography.name: Fabien Garcia

biography.bio: Laurent Buson was born on November 10, 1978 in Paris, France. He is known for his work on Die Fighting (2014), Merantau (2009) and Pharaoh (2015).
biography.name: Laurent Buson

biography.bio: Didier Buson is an actor and composer, known for Die Fighting (2014), Duel (2007) and Brothers Forever (2008).
biography.name: Didier Buson

biography.bio: Jess Allen was born as Jess Allen Sari. He is an actor, known for Broken Glass (2013), A Big Love Story (2012) and Die Fighting (2014).
biography.name: Jess Allen

biography.bio: Dave Vescio was born on June 24, 1970 in Somerset, Pennsylvania, USA as David Allen Vescio. He is an actor, known for Hick (2011), The Trials of Cate McCall (2013) and The Odd Way Home (2013).
biography.name: Dave Vescio

biography.bio: Adelyne Liu is known for her work on Die Fighting (2014), For or In (2011) and Inter-View (2010).
biography.name: Adelyne Liu

biography.bio: Xin Sarith Wuku is known for his work on ABCs of Death 2 (2014), Fist of the Dragon (2014) and Replay (2007).
biography.name: Xin Sarith Wuku

biography.bio: Jose was born and raised in Arizona. He began acting in 1998, starting with extra work and over the years worked his way up to supporting and lead roles in short and feature length films. Jose worked the Arizona independent scene for over ten years before moving to Hollywood. He's been fortunate with opportunities to work with such talents as Academy Award Winner George Kennedy, Dan Ireland, Rupert Friend, Jessica Chastain, Danny Trejo, Lindsay Shonteff, Kane Hodder, Matthew Leitch, and Todd Bridges. In 2013 you can catch Jose in the up-coming feature films - lead role in "Office Ninja", supporting role in "Age of Dinosaurs" with Ronny Cox and Treat Williams. He had a lead role in "Deliverance from Evil" with Angel Aviles, supporting role in "Cathedral Canyon" with Winsor Harmon and John McCook, supporting role in "Intersect" with Jason Spisak, lead role in "Blocked" with Tiffany Shepis, "Blood Cure" with Mackenzie Rosman, the lead voice in "Natalie's Lose Lose", "Hunting the Phantom" with Armand Assante and Kristanna Loken, Supporting role in "Vet" with Vivica A. Fox and Bai Ling, supporting role in "Grey Sheep", and a supporting role in "The Price of Success". Jose is part of the ensemble cast of Eric Roberts, Jeff Conaway, Martin Kove and Nia Peeples working on two films based on Dante's Divine Comedy, performing a compelling voice-over performing as a narrator in "Dante's Hell Animated" (2014) and (Inferno by Dante) "Dante's Inferno Documented"(2015). Both projects are directed by Boris Acosta. In 2012 and 2013, Jose's Television work includes "General Hospital", lead role as "Harry Humphries" in The Military Channel's "Warrior POV", a featured role in "The Mentalist", a lead role in the television series "Alternate History" for Spike Television, a supporting role in the series "Totally Tracked Down" with David Faustino, two episodes with supporting roles in "100 Ways to Die", and a supporting role in the National Geographic Television series "When Aliens Attack". Jose lends his voice to the lead character, "Oni" in the new video game "Suicide Run" (2014). He also did motion capture in other video games as well, although at this time, he is not able to reveal the games title. Jose can only say that it's a "very popular horror franchise. The video games and films have done very well in the past". Jose did the motion capture for the main character, and every "bad guy" but two. Jose also did motion capture, facial capture and voice for the THQ Inc video game "Juiced 2: Hot Import Nights" (2007). Jose lends his voice, playing a strong supporting character in the feature length animated film "Dragon Ballad Awakened". As well as voicing a supporting role in the short film "The Depression of Detective Downs 2: On Depression's Edge". Jose has a supporting role in a national commercial for The General Auto Insurance.
biography.name: Jose Rosete

biography.name: Gray Michael Sallies

biography.bio: Marcus recently Guest Starred in Hawaii Five-O "Hot Show" action TV series on CBS as "Tom Akuna". Also, recently got a Co-Star role in "Scorpion" TV show on CBS. He studied Psychology and Criminology at Glendale College in Glendale, California. He began working full time in various corporations in New York City and Los Angeles, California in the past two decades. Let it be known, Marcus has always been a leader in these companies that he has worked in the past as the General Manager and also the Regional/ District Manager of different big corporations in Southern California. Marcus always sets his bar high to his maximum expectations to set a great example to his subordinates. Ultimately, to accomplish his goals in his lifetime career in the entertainment industry.
biography.name: Marcus Natividad

biography.bio: Nico Johns is an actor, known for Die Fighting (2014).
biography.name: Nico Johns
